about_the_game: Relive the heart-pounding moments of crash landing on Subnautica’s Planet 4546B in the award-winning original soundtrack by Simon Chylinski. From sunlit shallows to deep, mysterious trenches, this 56-track sensory journey will take you through all the emotions of surviving, exploring, and uncovering the mystery of Subnautica once more.
detailed_description: Relive the heart-pounding moments of crash landing on Subnautica’s Planet 4546B in the award-winning original soundtrack by Simon Chylinski. From sunlit shallows to deep, mysterious trenches, this 56-track sensory journey will take you through all the emotions of surviving, exploring, and uncovering the mystery of Subnautica once more.
